meanings.definition: A television drama series that is typically melodramatic and revolves around romantic relationships.
meanings.sent1: My grandma loves to watch a telenovela every evening.
meanings.sent2: The telenovela had a lot of suspense and romance in each episode.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally walked into the wrong room and ended up in the middle of a telenovela scene.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a telenovela with all the drama and unexpected twists.
meanings.sent5: The telenovela painted a vivid picture of love and heartbreak.

meanings.definition: A type of soap opera produced and broadcast in Latin America.
meanings.sent1: The telenovela on TV last night was set in a beautiful Latin American town.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy watching telenovelas for their captivating storylines.
meanings.sent3: I wish my life had background music like a telenovela.
meanings.sent4: The telenovela of her life played out like a captivating story on screen.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors and passionate dialogues made the telenovela unforgettable.
